description: The structure of this file is **[ {\<SetCodeIdentifier\>:*Set:Code*, \<SetNameIdentifier\>:*Set:Name*, cards:\<AllCards.json\>}, ... ]**. You should have at least 1 of either AllCards.json or AllSets.json. You may have both, and if you have both, CGS will combine the data from both to use in-game.
